name: @codeandsoda/smooth-drag-order
description: - vertical dragging and reordering only - mobile (touch screen) support - Emits `change` event on reordering - mixed heights are supported - uses `MutationObserver` to keep up with children list changes. Will probably break if you change children list while the user is dragging though - can be destroyed and reinitialized without event listener stacking or clashing - 1.3Kb minified and gzipped - features *disgustingâ„¢* codestyle
